metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6106 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in theinit_node_manager functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.12 and 1.13. Aspecially crafted filesystem can be used to disclose information. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
